mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, subject, text, category, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from messages where category like concat('%', #{category} ,'%') and created_at between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by created_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into messages ( user_id, subject, text, category, created_at, updated_at ) values ( #{userId}, #{subject}, #{text}, #{category}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp )
